text: Thomas Americo (December 24, 1958 â€“ September 7, 1999) was an East Timorese professional boxer. He began boxing on April 19, 1980.https://boxrec.com/en/proboxer/18712 Americo died on September 7, 1999 because he was forced and dragged out of his car and was shot to death with a gun. == References == Category:1958 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Indonesian sportspeople Category:East Timorese people Category:Boxers Category:Deaths by firearm
